#How to install the Subversive plugin used to download and upload code. 

# Open Eclipse
# Go to Help->Software Updates->Find and Install...
# Select "Search for new features to install" and click next
# Click "New Remote Site"
# Name it whatever you want and use the url "http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/1.1/update-site/"  Click ok, then finish.
# Select the Subversive features you want to install and click finish.  The plugin should now be installed and restart eclipse.
